about_the_game:
A psychological horror adventure set in a futuristic, dreamlike city.

You are alone.
No money. No job.

Then you meet Brunilda, and everything changes.

Who is trying to kill her?
What do they want?
What did she do?

In this violent, decaying city, there are no answers—
Only dreams of love and obsession.

How long will Evo’s thrilling affair with Brunilda last before it all comes crashing down?

Features:

🔹Immersive Third-Person Exploration – Wander a surreal, futuristic city shrouded in mystery, where every corner hides a secret.

🚗Futuristic Vehicles & Beyond – Drive a hover truck through bullet-ridden streets, pilot drones to scout dangerous areas, and take to the skies in high-speed aircraft. From sleek hover cars to colossal floating ships, every vehicle adds a new dimension to your journey.

👁Tense Enemy Encounters – Confront shadowy threats that challenge your instincts and force you to think quickly under pressure.

⚔ Minimal Combat, Maximum Tension – Every encounter is a dangerous test of skill where the odds are rarely in your favor.

🎭Dynamic Interactions – Engage with characters and environments that react in unexpected and meaningful ways.

🎶 Atmospheric Sound & Voice Acting – Immerse yourself in a haunting original soundtrack and voice-acted dialogue that brings the world and its characters to life.

🧩Hidden Puzzles & Cryptic Messages – Uncover secret paths and decipher clues that pull you deeper into the mystery.

🎒Memo & Inventory System – Collect and manage cryptic notes, essential equipment, and key items to aid your journey.

A psychological horror adventure set in a futuristic, dreamlike city.

You are alone.
No money. No job.

Then you meet Brunilda, and everything changes.

In this violent, decaying city, there are no answers—
Only dreams of love and obsession.

How long will Evo’s thrilling affair with Brunilda last before it all comes crashing down?

Features:

🚗Futuristic Vehicles & Beyond – Drive a hover truck through bullet-ridden streets, pilot drones to scout dangerous areas, and take to the skies in high-speed aircraft. From sleek hover cars to colossal floating ships, every vehicle adds a new dimension to your journey.

👁Tense Enemy Encounters – Confront shadowy threats that challenge your instincts and force you to think quickly under pressure.

name: Alter Evo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above (64-bit Operating System Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.16GHz) or AMD Phenom X4 945 (3.0GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7770 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that 32-bit operating systems will not be supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, (3.20 Ghz) or AMD FX-8350, (4.00 Ghz)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB or AMD Radeon R9 280X 3GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that 32-bit operating systems will not be supported

short_description: A psychological horror adventure in a futuristic world where dreams bleed into reality. Unravel a web of haunting secrets, confront sinister forces, and uncover the truth buried in the city’s shadows. Only you can save Brunilda from the ghosts of her past—before they consume her.
